text: i love everything about dustforce. i like art style, i like chilling and at same time hardcore gameplay like super meat boy. and of course i like soundtrack. i can`t say that i have never heard anything like  that, but i must say that it sounds very unique. i`m in love with positive tracks such as cider time or it`s not supposed to be snowing. i feel goosebumps every time i listen to it.

author: David Alvarez

text: Think I first heard about Dustforce while browsing your uploads years ago now. Wound up giving the game a go, getting that SS clear on every single stage (eventually...). The leaderboard system was very good, prompting me to try for some better times, eventually landing a few world records on some stages. Got involved with the speedrunning community as a result. I don't play the game much these days, but wanted to offer some thanks for that

author: GamingNobility

text: As someone living in Montreal, I never like when we have to stop the Daylight Saving Time since that means it's already night when I leave from work. I need more of the sun's Vitamin D! Anyways, this is still one of my go-to OSTs while I work. I'm still wondering why Lifeformed didn't compose for any other games with how talented he is.
